appRoles.description: Allows the application to read all the AppCatalog

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the signed-in files of the user and files shared with the user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user files and files shared with user
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your files and files shared with you.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read your files and files shared with you

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to search across the users office content. This content includes relevant people, documents, emails and skype messages.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Search across the office content of the user
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to search across the users office content. This content includes your relevant people, documents, emails and skype messages.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to search across sharepoint content. This is used for 3S unfurl route.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Search across the users office content
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to search across sharepoint content. This is used for 3S unfurl route.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list QnA and to read their properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list QnA and to read their properties on your behalf.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a ranked list of relevant people of the signed-in user. The list includes local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype)
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that's most relevant to you. This includes your local contacts, your contacts from social networking, people listed in your organization's directory, and people from recent communications.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read email in user mailboxes.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read email in your mailbox.
